definition.text: Use this switch as an organizational device, and to spawn User Profile Vote nodes.

paragraphs.text: You may use this switch for two different purposes:
As an organizational device: You may create arbitrary arrangements of votes, spawning more switches and votes.
As a switch: You may control the flow of Voting Power, pretty much like with a Token Power Switch, but within the Voting Program. If you need a reminder, read about how Token Power Flows.
